name: Color Morphing Grid
description: Grid of spheres that morph colors and scale based on mathematical functions

functionCalls.code: const objects = []; const gridSize = 8; const spacing = 2; for(let x=0; x<gridSize; x++) { for(let z=0; z<gridSize; z++) { const id = `sphere_${x}_${z}`; const px = (x - gridSize/2) * spacing; const pz = (z - gridSize/2) * spacing; objects.push({ id, type: 'Sphere', position: [px, 2, pz], radius: 0.4, color: '#ffffff', nonPhysics: true }); const dist = Math.sqrt(px*px + pz*pz); globalNonPhysicsEngine.animateObject(id, { code: `const wave = Math.sin(time * 2 - ${dist} * 0.3); mesh.position.y = 2 + wave * 2; const hue = (time * 50 + ${x * 45} + ${z * 45}) % 360; mesh.material.color.setHSL(hue / 360, 0.7, 0.5); const scale = 0.8 + wave * 0.4; mesh.scale.set(scale, scale, scale);` }); }} return objects;
